title: I want to be a PBE tester
body: I have put in my application in about +6 months ago and it says application was received. What do I do to increase my chance to PBE test?

replies.body: Submitting your application was a solid plan, but we don't have any way to expedite or make an application go through.  I also don't have any details on how to increase chances, beyond what's available in our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Just keep an eye out on your email should you get approved.  Good luck!
Seems like you can make streamers', pros', and youtubers' applications go through a lot faster...
Nothing. Ive been waiting for years like many others.
